\title{\textcyr{\CYRN\cyra\cyrc\cyri\cyro\cyrn\cyra\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrn\cyrery\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyri\cyrs\cyrs\cyrl\cyre\cyrd\cyro\cyrv\cyra\cyrt\cyre\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrs\cyrk\cyri\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrya\cyrd\cyre\cyrr\cyrn\cyrery\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyru\cyrn\cyri\cyrv\cyre\cyrr\cyrs\cyri\cyrt\cyre\cyrt}
«\textcyr{\CYRM\CYRI\CYRF\CYRI}»}
\maketitle

\subsection*{\textcyr{\CYRO\cyrt\cyrch\cyre\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyre\cyrd\cyrm\cyre\cyrt\cyru}
'\textcyr{\CYRK\cyro\cyrm\cyrp\cyrsftsn\cyryu\cyrt\cyre\cyrr\cyrn\cyrery\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyre\cyrh\cyrn\cyro\cyrl\cyro\cyrg\cyri\cyri}'.}

\paragraph{\textcyr{\CYRG\cyrr\cyru\cyrp\cyrp\cyra}: \textcyr{\CYRM}22-403}

\paragraph*{\textcyr{\CYRV\cyrery\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyrn\cyri\cyrl} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrt\cyru\cyrd\cyre\cyrn\cyrt}:
\textcyr{\CYRH\cyru\cyrd\cyra\cyrishrt\cyrb\cyre\cyrr\cyrg\cyre\cyrn\cyro\cyrv}
\textcyr{\CYRA\cyrb\cyrd\cyru\cyrm\cyru\cyrh\cyra\cyrm\cyre\cyrd}.}

1-\textcyr{\CYRZ\cyra\cyrd\cyra\cyrch\cyra}: \textcyr{\CYRN\cyra\cyrishrt\cyrd\cyri\cyrt\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrs\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyro\cyrzh\cyri\cyrt\cyre\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrn\cyrery\cyre},
\textcyr{\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyru\cyrl\cyre\cyrv\cyrery\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrr\cyrn\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyru\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya} 

\begin{equation}
sinx-0.1x=0
\end{equation}

\textcyr{\CYRR\CYRE\CYRSH\CYRE\CYRN\CYRI\CYRE}:

\textcyr{\CYRD\cyrl\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyre\cyrsh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrn\cyra\cyrch\cyra\cyrl\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyrr\cyro\cyri\cyrl}
\textcyr{\cyrg\cyrr\cyra\cyrf\cyri\cyrk}, \textcyr{\cyrch\cyrt\cyro\cyrb\cyrery}
\textcyr{\cyru\cyrv\cyri\cyrd\cyre\cyrt\cyrsftsn}, \textcyr{\cyrv}
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyra\cyrk\cyro\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyri\cyra\cyrp\cyra\cyrz\cyro\cyrn\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrf\cyru\cyrn\cyrk\cyrc\cyri\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrm\cyre\cyrn\cyrya\cyre\cyrt}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyrv\cyro\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrz\cyrn\cyra\cyrk},
\textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrp\cyrr\cyri\cyrm\cyre\cyrr}, \textcyr{\cyro\cyrt}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyro\cyrzh\cyri\cyrt\cyre\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrn\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrk} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrt\cyrr\cyri\cyrc\cyra\cyrt\cyre\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrn\cyro\cyrm\cyru}.
\textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrt\cyro\cyrm\cyru} \textcyr{\cyrch\cyrt\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrm\cyrery} \textcyr{\cyrz\cyrn\cyra\cyre\cyrm}, \textcyr{\cyrch\cyrt\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrm\cyre\cyrzh\cyrd\cyru} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyra\cyrk\cyri\cyrm\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrz\cyrn\cyra\cyrch\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya\cyrm\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrf\cyru\cyrn\cyrk\cyrc\cyri\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyru\cyrl\cyryu}.

\textcyr{\CYRD\cyrl\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrp\cyri\cyrs\cyra\cyrl} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrl\cyre\cyrd\cyru\cyryu\cyrshch\cyri\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrl\cyri\cyrs\cyrt\cyri\cyrn\cyrg}.

$f=@(x)sin(x)-0.1*x;$

$x=0:0.1:10;$

$y=f(x);$plot$(x,y$, 'LineWidth', 2$);$

grid on;

\begin{figure}
\begin{centering}

\par\end{centering}
\caption{1-\textcyr{\CYRG\cyrr\cyra\cyrf\cyri\cyrk} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrf\cyru\cyrn\cyrk\cyrc\cyri\cyri}}
\end{figure}

\textcyr{\CYRS\cyrv\cyrya\cyrz\cyra\cyrn\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrs} \textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyri\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrg\cyrr\cyra\cyrf\cyri\cyrk\cyro\cyrm}, \textcyr{\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrb\cyrr\cyra\cyrl} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyri\cyra\cyrp\cyra\cyrz\cyro\cyrn}
\textcyr{\cyro\cyrt} 2 \textcyr{\cyrd\cyro} 4.\textcyr{\CYRI} \textcyr{\cyre\cyrshch\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrz} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrf\cyru\cyrn\cyrk\cyrc\cyri\cyri}
\textcyr{\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrp\cyri\cyrs\cyra\cyrl} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrl\cyre\cyrd\cyru\cyryu\cyrshch\cyri\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrl\cyri\cyrs\cyrt\cyri\cyrn\cyrg}.

>\textcompwordmark > $f=@(x)sin(x)-0.1*x;$

$x$ = linspace$(2,4,1000);$

positive\_roots =$[]$;

for i = 1:length$(x)$-1

if$f(x(i))*f(x(i+1))<0$

root = fzero$(f,[x(i),x(i+1)])$;

if root > 0

positive\_roots = $[$positive\_roots, root$]$;

end 

end 

end

disp('\textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrl\cyro\cyrzh\cyri\cyrt\cyre\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrn\cyrery\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrr\cyrn\cyri}:'); 

disp(positive\_roots);

figure; plot$(x,f(x));$

hold on; 

scatter(positive\_roots, zeros(size(positive\_roots)), 'r', 'filled'); 

title$('$\textcyr{\CYRG\cyrr\cyra\cyrf\cyri\cyrk} \textcyr{\cyrf\cyru\cyrn\cyrk\cyrc\cyri\cyri}$f(x)')$;

xlabel$('x')$;

ylabel$('f(x)')$;

legend$('f(x)','$\textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrl\cyro\cyrzh\cyri\cyrt\cyre\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrn\cyrery\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrr\cyrn\cyri}$')$;

\textcyr{\CYRR\cyre\cyrz\cyru\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrt\cyra\cyrt}:\textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrl\cyro\cyrzh\cyri\cyrt\cyre\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrn\cyrery\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrr\cyrn\cyri}: $2.8523$

\textcyr{\CYRI} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyri\cyrl} \textcyr{\cyrt\cyra\cyrk\cyro\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyrr\cyre\cyrz\cyru\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrt\cyra\cyrt};

\textcyr{\CYRO\cyrt\cyrv\cyre\cyrt}: $2.8523$ \textcyr{\cyrm\cyre\cyrzh\cyrd\cyru}
$x=0:10;$

2-\textcyr{\CYRZ\cyra\cyrd\cyra\cyrch\cyra}: \textcyr{\CYRO\cyrp\cyrr\cyre\cyrd\cyre\cyrl\cyri\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrz\cyrn\cyra\cyrch\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyro\cyrya\cyrn\cyrn\cyro\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\CYRS\cyrt\cyre\cyrf\cyra\cyrn\cyra}-\textcyr{\CYRB\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrc\cyrm\cyra\cyrn\cyra}
\textgreek{sv} \textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrz\cyra\cyrk\cyro\cyrn\cyre}
\textcyr{\CYRS\cyrt\cyre\cyrf\cyra\cyrn\cyra}-\textcyr{\CYRB\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrc\cyrm\cyra\cyrn\cyra}:$j=\sigma T^{4}$,
\textcyr{\cyrg\cyrd\cyre} j - \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrl\cyro\cyrt\cyrn\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrn\cyre\cyrr\cyrg\cyre\cyrt\cyri\cyrch\cyre\cyrs\cyrk\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrt\cyro\cyrk\cyra} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrz\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyra\cyrb\cyrs\cyro\cyrl\cyryu\cyrt\cyrn\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrch\cyre\cyrr\cyrn\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyre\cyrl\cyra}, $T$ - \textcyr{\cyrt\cyre\cyrm\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyra\cyrt\cyru\cyrr\cyra}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyre\cyrl\cyra}. \textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyro\cyrya\cyrn\cyrn\cyra\cyrya}
\textcyr{\CYRS\cyrt\cyre\cyrf\cyra\cyrn\cyra}-\textcyr{\CYRB\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrc\cyrm\cyra\cyrn\cyra}
\textcyr{\cyro\cyrp\cyrr\cyre\cyrd\cyre\cyrl\cyrya\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrs\cyrl\cyre} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrn\cyrt\cyre\cyrg\cyrr\cyri\cyrr\cyro\cyrv\cyra\cyrn\cyri\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrf\cyro\cyrr\cyrm\cyru\cyrl\cyrery} \textcyr{\CYRP\cyrl\cyra\cyrn\cyrk\cyra}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrs\cyre\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrch\cyra\cyrs\cyrt\cyro\cyrt\cyra\cyrm}
$\nu:$ 

\begin{equation}
B(\nu;T)=\text{\ensuremath{\frac{2h\nu^{3}}{c^{2}}}}\text{\ensuremath{\frac{1}{(exp(\frac{h\nu}{k_{B}T})-1)}}}
\end{equation}


\paragraph{\textcyr{\cyrg\cyrd\cyre}:}
\begin{lyxlist}{00.00.0000}
\item [{-}] $\nu$ - \textcyr{\cyrch\cyra\cyrs\cyrt\cyro\cyrt\cyra} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrz\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya},
\item [{-}] $h$ - \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyro\cyrya\cyrn\cyrn\cyra\cyrya}
\textcyr{\CYRP\cyrl\cyra\cyrn\cyrk\cyra}, 
\item [{-}] $c$ - \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrk\cyro\cyrr\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyrv\cyre\cyrt\cyra},
\item [{-}] $k_{B}$ - \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyro\cyrya\cyrn\cyrn\cyra\cyrya}
\textcyr{\CYRB\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrc\cyrm\cyra\cyrn\cyra}.
\end{lyxlist}
\textcyr{\CYRR\CYRE\CYRSH\CYRE\CYRN\CYRI\CYRE}:

\textcyr{\CYRYA} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrn\cyra\cyrch\cyra\cyrl\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrp\cyri\cyrs\cyra\cyrl}
\textcyr{\cyrf\cyru\cyrn\cyrk\cyrc\cyri\cyryu}, \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyri\cyrm\cyre\cyrr\cyrn\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrv\cyrz\cyrya\cyrl} \textcyr{\cyrz\cyrn\cyra\cyrch\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyro\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyru\cyrl\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyro}
50, \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyrr\cyro\cyri\cyrl} \textcyr{\cyrg\cyrr\cyra\cyrf\cyri\cyrk}
\textcyr{\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyro\cyra\cyrn\cyra\cyrl\cyri\cyrz\cyri\cyrr\cyro\cyrv\cyra\cyrl},
\textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrk\cyra\cyrk\cyro\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyri\cyra\cyrp\cyra\cyrz\cyro\cyrn\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyre\cyrs\cyrt\cyrsftsn} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrm\cyrery\cyrs\cyrl}.
\textcyr{\CYRZ\cyra\cyrt\cyre\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrz\cyrya\cyrl}
\textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrz\cyrn\cyra\cyrch\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrz\cyra} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrn\cyrt\cyre\cyrg\cyrr\cyra\cyrl},
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyrr\cyro\cyri\cyrn\cyrt\cyre\cyrg\cyrr\cyri\cyrr\cyro\cyrv\cyra\cyrl}
\textcyr{\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyre\cyrsh\cyri\cyrl} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrs\cyre}
.

\textcyr{\CYRK\cyro\cyrd\cyrery} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyre\cyrsh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyrya}:

x=0:0.1:50;

plot(x,x.\textasciicircum 3./(exp(x)-1))

\textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrs\cyrl\cyre} \textcyr{\cyra\cyrn\cyra\cyrl\cyri\cyrz\cyra}
\textcyr{\cyrg\cyrr\cyra\cyrf\cyri\cyrk\cyra}, \textcyr{\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrn\cyrya\cyrl},
\textcyr{\cyrch\cyrt\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrs\cyrm\cyrery\cyrs\cyrl} \textcyr{\cyrz\cyra\cyrk\cyrl\cyryu\cyrch\cyra\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrv} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyri\cyra\cyrp\cyra\cyrz\cyro\cyrn\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyro\cyrt} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyru\cyrl\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyrya\cyrt\cyrn\cyra\cyrd\cyrc\cyra\cyrt\cyri}. \textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrerev\cyrt\cyro\cyrm\cyru}
\textcyr{\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyre\cyrsh\cyri\cyrl} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrz\cyrya\cyrt\cyrsftsn}
\textcyr{\cyri\cyrn\cyrt\cyre\cyrg\cyrr\cyra\cyrl} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrt}
\textcyr{\cyrn\cyru\cyrl\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrya\cyrt\cyrn\cyra\cyrd\cyrc\cyra\cyrt\cyri}.

\textcyr{\CYRP\cyro\cyrs\cyrt\cyro\cyrya\cyrn\cyrn\cyra\cyrya} \textcyr{\CYRS\cyrt\cyre\cyrf\cyra\cyrn\cyra}-\textcyr{\CYRB\cyro\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrc\cyrm\cyra\cyrn\cyra}
\textcyr{\cyro\cyrp\cyrr\cyre\cyrd\cyre\cyrl\cyrya\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrs\cyrl\cyre} \textcyr{\cyri\cyrn\cyrt\cyre\cyrg\cyrr\cyri\cyrr\cyro\cyrv\cyra\cyrn\cyri\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrf\cyro\cyrr\cyrm\cyru\cyrl\cyrery} \textcyr{\CYRP\cyrl\cyra\cyrn\cyrk\cyra}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrs\cyre\cyrm} \textcyr{\cyrch\cyra\cyrs\cyrt\cyro\cyrt\cyra\cyrm}
$\nu$:

\begin{equation}
B(\nu;T)=\text{\ensuremath{\frac{2h\nu^{3}}{c^{2}}}}\text{\ensuremath{\frac{1}{(exp(\frac{h\nu}{k_{B}T})-1)}}}
\end{equation}

$x=0:0.1:15$

\textcyr{\CYRYA} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrch\cyri\cyrs\cyrl\cyrya\cyrl}
\textcyr{\cyri\cyrn\cyrt\cyre\cyrg\cyrr\cyra\cyrl} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyro\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrf\cyro\cyrr\cyrm\cyru\cyrl\cyrery}:

\begin{equation}
\nu'=\frac{h\nu}{k_{B}T}=x
\end{equation}

\textcyr{\CYRT\cyre\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyrsftsn} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyre\cyrm\cyrn\cyro\cyrg\cyro}
\textcyr{\cyrm\cyra\cyrt\cyre\cyrm\cyra\cyrt\cyri\cyrch\cyre\cyrs\cyrk\cyro\cyrishrt}
\textcyr{\cyra\cyrr\cyri\cyrf\cyrm\cyre\cyrt\cyri\cyrk\cyri}.

$\int\frac{1}{e^{\frac{h\nu}{k_{B}T}}-1}d\nu\cdot2\cdot\frac{h\nu^{3}}{c^{2}}$
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyre\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyrsftsn} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyra\cyrv\cyra\cyrishrt\cyrt\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyre\cyrf\cyro\cyrr\cyrm\cyru\cyrl\cyri\cyrr\cyru\cyre\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyro},\textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya} $\frac{h\nu}{k_{B}T}=x$;
$dx=d\nu\frac{h}{k_{B}T}$; $\nu=\frac{xkT}{h};$

\textcyr{\CYRT\cyro\cyrg\cyrd\cyra} \textcyr{\cyrm\cyrery} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyro\cyrl\cyru\cyrch\cyra\cyre\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyrl\cyre\cyrd\cyru\cyryu\cyrshch\cyri\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrr\cyre\cyrz\cyru\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrt\cyra\cyrt}.

$\int\frac{1}{e^{x}-1}\cdot2\cdot x^{3}\frac{\left(k\cdot T\right)^{4}}{c^{2}h^{3}}dx$
\textcyr{\cyri} \textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyrery\cyrr\cyra\cyrzh\cyre\cyrn\cyri\cyre}
\textcyr{\cyrr\cyra\cyrv\cyrn\cyro} $\sigma\cdot T^{4}$, \textcyr{\cyrt\cyro\cyrg\cyrd\cyra}
\textcyr{\cyrt\cyre\cyrm\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyra\cyrt\cyru\cyrr\cyra}
\textcyr{\cyrs\cyro\cyrk\cyrr\cyra\cyrshch\cyra\cyre\cyrt\cyrs\cyrya},
\textcyr{\cyrk\cyro\cyrg\cyrd\cyra} 

\begin{equation}
\sigma=\int\frac{1}{e^{x}-1}\cdot2\cdot x^{3}\cdot\frac{k^{4}}{c^{2}h^{3}}dx
\end{equation}

\textcyr{\CYRI} \textcyr{\cyrv\cyro\cyrz\cyrsftsn\cyrm\cyre\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyri\cyrn\cyrt\cyre\cyrg\cyrr\cyra\cyrl} \textcyr{\cyro\cyrt}
\textcyr{\cyrn\cyru\cyrl\cyrya} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyro} \textcyr{\cyrp\cyrya\cyrt\cyrn\cyra\cyrd\cyrc\cyra\cyrt\cyri}:

\begin{equation}
\sigma=\text{\ensuremath{\int\limits _{0}^{15}}}\frac{1}{e^{x}-1}\cdot2\cdot x^{3}\cdot\frac{k^{4}}{c^{2}h^{3}}dx
\end{equation}

\textcyr{\CYRT\cyre\cyrp\cyre\cyrr\cyrsftsn} \textcyr{\cyrn\cyra\cyrp\cyri\cyrsh\cyre\cyrm}
\textcyr{\cyrl\cyri\cyrs\cyrt\cyri\cyrn\cyrg} \textcyr{\cyrd\cyrl\cyrya}
\textcyr{\cyrerev\cyrt\cyro\cyrishrt} \textcyr{\cyrf\cyro\cyrr\cyrm\cyru\cyrl\cyrery}
\textcyr{\cyrn\cyra} MATLAB.

h = $6.62e-34;$

c = $3e8;$

k = $1.38e-23;$

B = @(x) (x.\textasciicircum 3./(exp(x)-1)){*}2{*}(k.\textasciicircum 4./(h.\textasciicircum 3.{*}c.\textasciicircum 2));

result = integral(B, 0 ,15);

disp({[} ' \textcyr{\cyrr\cyre\cyrz\cyru\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrt\cyra\cyrt}
', num2str(result){]});

\textcyr{\cyrr\cyre\cyrz\cyru\cyrl\cyrsftsn\cyrt\cyra\cyrt} $5.6663e-08$

: $5.6663e-08$
